text: Thank you David :hearts: this week I’ll do some progress on my dissertation. I graduate on September this year. So I was thinking of applying once new vacancies open. I heard some open in November. So my aim is to polish my reel and get it ready for November.

The info you sent is very helpful. And yes I love to work so I don’t mind starting from the bottom and up. This is what I enjoy doing so I could literally spend all day doing comp and it’s fun for me. I think for the demo reel I’ll try to update it soon. Since this summer I’m involved in a couple of projects I’ll be updating it once they are ready.
And please do keep talking I know you have experience in the field so I am happy to listen :)
